attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is for the fathers  who want the rights for their childern to live with them , why should the childern aways side with the mothers , we the fathers are just as good if not better suited to care for our childern

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
